mapper.select: SELECT t.oneName as comName, DATE_FORMAT(t.gsDate, '%Y-%m-01') AS statDate, ifnull(SUM(num),0) AS num, 1 as type FROM (SELECT zbd.`oneName`, zbd.`gsDate`, COUNT(1) AS num FROM `zhongbiao_detail` zbd WHERE zbd.gsDate >= #{startDate} AND zbd.gsDate <= #{endDate} AND zbd.`oneName` IS NOT NULL AND zbd.`oneName` != '' GROUP BY zbd.`oneName`, zbd.`gsDate`) t GROUP BY t.oneName;

choose.when: SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(t1.comNameCount), 0) AS comNameCount, IFNULL(SUM(t1.sumNum), 0) AS sumNum FROM (SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(t.com_name), 0) AS comNameCount, IFNULL(SUM(t.num), 0) AS sumNum FROM tb_count_bid_info t WHERE t.stat_date >= #{statDate} AND t.stat_date <= #{endDate} GROUP BY t.`com_name` HAVING SUM(t.num) >= #{count}) t1
